sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\[
	q = \frac{4xy }{x + y }
\]
Then find the value of the expression
\[
	\frac{q + 2x }{q - 2x } + \frac{q + 2y }{q - 2y }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	q = \frac{4xy }{x + y }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q }{2\input[s1v1]{}} = \frac{2y }{\input[s1v2]{} + y }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Applying componendo and dividendo, we get
\[
	\frac{\input[s2v1]{}+ 2x }{q - 2x } = \frac{2\input[s2v2]{} + (x + y )}{2y - (x + y )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q + 2x }{q - 2x } = \frac{x + 3y }{y - x }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "

Now, from the given expression, we can also write,
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{2y } = \frac{2x }{\input[s3v2]{} + y }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, by applying componendo and dividendo for this equation on both sides, we get
\[
	\frac{q + 2\input[s4v1]{}}{q - 2y } = \frac{2x + (\input[s4v2]{} + y )}{2x - (x + y )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q + 2y }{q - 2y } = \frac{3x + y }{x - y }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, by adding the above two expressions, we can get
\[
	\frac{q + 2x }{q - 2x } + \frac{q + 2y }{q - 2y } = \frac{x + 3y }{y - x } + \frac{3\input[s5v1]{}+ y }{x - y }
\]
\[
	= \frac{3x + \input[s5v2]{} }{x - y } - \frac{x + 3y }{x - y } 
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 3, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{3x + y - x - 3y }{x - y }
\]
\[
	= \frac{2(\input[s6v1]{} - y )}{x - \input[s6v2]{} }
\]
\[
	= \input[s6v3]{}
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["x", "x"], "text": "$$\text{ Dividing $q = \frac{4xy }{x + y }$ by $2x$, we get $\frac{q }{2x } = \frac{2y }{x + y }$}$$"}, {"data": ["q", "y"], "text": "$$\text{Subsequently applying componendo and dividendo and further simplification leads us to $\frac{q + 2x }{q - 2x } = \frac{x + 3y }{y - x }$}$$"}, {"data": ["q", "x"], "text": "$$\text{ Dividing $q = \frac{4xy }{x + y }$ by $2y$, we get $\frac{q }{2y } = \frac{2x }{x + y }$}$$"}, {"data": ["y", "x"], "text": "$$\text{Subsequently applying componendo and dividendo and further simplification leads us to $\frac{q + 2y }{q - 2y } = \frac{3x + y }{x - y }$}$$"}, {"data": ["x", "y"], "text": "$$\text{Taking LCM's and then simplifying terms in numerator together we get $\frac{3x + y }{x - y } - \frac{x + 3y }{x - y }$}$$"}, {"data": ["x", "y", 2], "text": "$$\text{Further simplification will lead us to the result $2$. "}]
